message: Let's start with a fair-ish split.  I'll take 90%, you get 10%. We can adjust from there.

Let's be fair. I rejected your 55/45 split because it was too unfavorable, but I think a 55/45 split in my favor is a good compromise. We can work together to reach a solution.
